text: Luxury Vinyl is a type of rigid vinyl flooring that is designed to mimic the look and feel of natural materials like wood or stone
text2: It is composed of several layers. The topmost layer is a transparent wear layer that provides protection against scratches, stains, and fading.
text3: It is followed by a decorative layer that features a high-resolution image of wood, stone, or other patterns.
text4: The core layer is made of a stone plastic composite, which is a mixture of natural limestone powder, polyvinyl chloride (PVC), and stabilizers. Finally, there is an underlayment layer that provides additional sound insulation and cushioning.
